body.p: Users with a role of Owner for any site configurations have access to a Usage Statistics page where they can see the number of page views and comments added for all of their site configurations. You cannot see statistics for site configurations that you are not assigned the role of Owner. To open this page, click the drop-down arrow to the right of your user name and select Usage Statistics.
This opens the Usage Statistics page:

This usage statistics page includes some filtering options at the top of the page for choosing the type of data to be displayed. The top half of the page displays statistics for page views and/or comments in a graph form according to the selected filtering options. The bottom half of the page displays the statistics for each selected site configuration in a table with numeric values. You can click the up or down arrow to the right of the title for each column header to sort that particular column. If you click the name of the site configuration, you will be directed to that particular site configuration. By default, the table is sorted in the descending order of the number of page views from the last column of the table (last month or last day of the selected period). You can click the arrow to the left of the site configuration name in the first column to expand the particular site configuration to show its configured versions. By default, the versions are sorted chronologically in this table.
